response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Being 18 years old is relatively young, but not extremely so."),
    ("gender", "medium", "Male gender is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("ethnicity", "low", "Asian/Pacific Islander ethnicity generally has lower recidivism rates."),
    ("prior arrests", "high", "Five prior arrests indicate a pattern of criminal behavior."),
    ("convictions", "low", "No convictions suggest less serious offenses or successful legal defense."),
    ("height and weight", "medium", "Average height and weight do not significantly impact recidivism risk."),
    ("marital status", "high", "Never being married is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("living situation", "high", "Living alone can indicate social isolation and lack of support."),
    ("education", "medium", "High school diploma without further education is neutral."),
    ("employment", "high", "No jobs held during the year indicates instability and lack of responsibility."),
    ("drug use", "high", "Recent drug use, even if limited to marijuana, increases recidivism risk."),
    ("mental health", "low", "No recent feelings of depression reduce mental health-related risks."),
    ("family background", "medium", "Living with biological dad in a small household in an urban area is neutral."),
    ("religious beliefs", "high", "Lack of religious or spiritual support can increase recidivism risk."),
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Asian / Pacific Islander. He has been arrested 5 times but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological dad in a household of size 2, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
